alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 26 at 4:53AM PDT until September 28 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts of 55 to 60 mph possible in wind-prone areas during the evening and overnight hours tonight and Wednesday. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong winds will combine with a dry air mass to create elevated to potentially critical fire- weather conditions. In addition, there will be periods of time in the late morning and early afternoon each day when winds temporarily subside, but then they will increase again before sunset.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
